title: Women in Business Fund
description: A government-backed microloan program supporting small-scale women entrepreneurs in Garissa County.

title: GirlTech Training Bootcamp
description: A 3-month coding and digital skills program aimed at helping young women build tech careers.

title: Mama Shujaa Initiative
description: Focuses on maternal health awareness, prenatal care, and training for rural health volunteers.

title: She Trades Africa
description: Empowering women-led businesses with export and trade knowledge through mentorship and funding.

title: Nomadic Women Literacy Project
description: Offers basic literacy and numeracy training to nomadic women and girls in rural regions.
